el:identity.el:subtitle: An illustration of the famous Epimenides paradox

el:english.el:comment: Buridan invented this paradox: A:'B is false' and B:'A is true'; it is not necessary to play to this level.
wordplay between 'right' (converse of left) and 'right' (true); not necessary to translate.

el:string.el:english: The other document lies and the left wormhole is the right one.
